description: Guardrails for ORKO command parser unsafe/destructive and high-risk actions.
rule: No execution of unsafe/destructive actions without explicit confirmation.
notes: Parser must label intents using destructive_verbs as destructive.
High-risk actions MUST NOT execute without explicit user confirmation.
Medium-risk actions may require confirmation based on org policy.
Low-risk actions execute normally unless flagged by other guardrails.
Until confirmation is received for destructive or high-risk actions, only simulate=true is allowed.
Risk tiers support multi-industry safety rules (IT, HR, finance, logistics, operations, compliance).
